newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Adobe Systems cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Adobe Systems cut.

text.p: Hambrecht & Quist LLC analyst Christopher Galvin cut his rating on shares of Adobe Systems Inc to hold from buy following the company's report late Wednesday of earnings for the second quarter ended May 31.
-- He said Q2 sales of $228 million were above his estimate of $226 million, but normalized earnings of $0.57/shr were below his estimate of $0.59/shr. He cited rising expenses for shortfall.
-- said gross margins are expected to fall further to below 25 percent for the second half of 1997.
-- cut his fiscal year 1997 earnings estimate to $2.17/shr from $2.35 and fiscal 1998 to $2.45/shr from $2.70.
